Name: Stormtrooper Admirer
Text:
You were not destined to be a Stormtrooper, but you admire them, there blind loyalty, their force of character (i.e.: always following order) and their dedication to the New Order. That lead you to learn all of the Stormtrooper corps basics, allowing you to effectively command multiple Stormtroopers as if they were only one!

The PC can add [BO] to all combat check made by Stormtroopers under his order for one round. Can only be used once per rank per encounter.

Name: Squadron Leader
Text:
You always wished to make it to the academy, maybe you even did, but in the end, you were better out of the Ties. That never stopped you from learning all that need to be known to be an effective squad leader though!

The PC can add [BO] to all combat check made by Tie Fighters under his order for one round. Can only be used once per rank per encounter.
